data.title: Master's degree
data.meta_description: Earn your Master’s degree at PSL and help secure your ambitions, with a world-class diploma recognized by your future employers all around the world.
data.text:
Graduate education at PSL is selective, targeting students of all backgrounds that display high levels of potential, with the goal of equipping each and every student to excel.

By pursing a Master’s at PSL, you are opting for:

internationally recognized, world-class diplomas to ensure a successful launch to your career

immersion in some of the most renowned research centers

special access to a vast network of companies as well as the alumni networks.

an unparalleled academic experience in every field of knowledge, from generalist disciplines to the rarest specialties

international and customizable curriculum through new PSL's graduate programs

50+ master's degree programs in every field – sciences, engineering, humanities, social sciences and the Arts

44 Master’s programs

5 Master’s-level 'Grandes Écoles' degrees: engineering programs at ESPCI - PSL, MINES Paris - PSL and École nationale supérieure de Chimie de Paris - PSL; École Normale Supérieure - PSL diplomas

"Jouer & mettre en scène" CNSAD - PSL diploma.
